acceptNomination(string,string).details: Can only be called by the nominated artist themselves.

params._artistId: The unique identifier of the artist.

params.artistAddress: The wallet address of the artist.

returns.name: The name of the artist.
returns.wallet: The wallet address associated with the artist.

params.artistAddress: Address of the artist to check.

returns.isRegistered: True if the artist is registered, false otherwise.

params.nominee: The address of the artist being nominated.

params.tokenId: The token ID for which to set the URI

params._artistId: The unique identifier of the artist.
params._bio: The new biography for the artist.
params._name: The new name for the artist.
params._wallet: The new wallet for the artist.

acceptNomination(string,string).notice: Accepts the nomination for the artist, allowing them to complete their registration.

deregisterArtist(uint256).notice: Allows an artist to deregister themselves from the registry.

getArtist(address).notice: Retrieves the information of an artist based on their wallet address.

isArtistRegistered(address).notice: Checks if an artist is registered in the registry.

nominate(address).notice: Nominates an artist for registration, can only be called by an artist with referral credits.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the URI for a given token ID

updateArtist(uint256,string,string,addre.notice: Allows an artist to update their profile with a new name and biography.
